abstractText: Snag data is collected within belt transects (method ID: 151). Field technicians collect snag data in conjunction with tree canopy closure measurements.The diameter breast height (dbh) of all snags located within tenth-acre belt transects is measured. Either the actualdbhis recorded, or snag data is reported by class e.g., 5 snags <4dbh, 2 snags >20 dbh etc., (see dbh section). Crew supervisors will advise whether to collect snag data by class or specific dbh.
title: Snags v1.0
